The Quranic researcher who disbelieves lying, i.E., by the Qur’an, and it is a resignation of their being, they do not prostrate to it with his readers to their eyes, and they are not.The connector is the position of their guarantee to the registration of them with disbelief and poems with the cause of judgment.Al -Dahhak and Ibn Abi Ubila read: “They lied” diluted and conquered the yaa.
